name: 远交近攻 (Befriend the ones from afar, attack the ones close by)
name_original: 远交近攻 (Befriend the ones from afar, attack the ones close by)
description:
口困囚口VI shakes you awake and the naked electrical wires of its arm dig into your shoulder. You shove it off violently. It coughs smoke out of its cylindrical canister and its turbine is whirring sickly.

"GET THE F*** OUT OF YOUR BED MASTER"
